name: UpdateSeller
description: This endpoint allows marketplace operators to update the information of sellers connected to their account. You can replace a path's value with another value in order to update that single information. There is no need to fill all the body params available, only the one you wish to update.

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account that belongs to the marketplace.

environment.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

sellerId.description: A string that identifies the seller in the marketplace. This ID must be created by the marketplace

operation.description: The action being performed, which is always going to be `replace`.

path.description: The path in which the value is being updated. It follows the standardized format `/{field}`, where `{field}` is the path's name.

value.description: The value that is being updated. Notice that the type will depend on the path that is being updated.
